00010 // This is base class for all Bolo System Records.
00011 // It contains the run name, given as the first four alpha-numeric values
00012 // of the run name from Samba. For example, kc21, is 2010, March 21st. 
00013 // 
00014

00040 KBoloSystemRecord& KBoloSystemRecord::operator=(const KBoloSystemRecord &aRec)
00041 {
00042         if(&aRec == this) return *this;
00043         
00044         this->KSystemRecord::operator=(aRec);
00045         CopyLocalMembers(aRec);
00046         return *this;
00047 }

00056 void KBoloSystemRecord::Clear(Option_t *opt)
00057 {
00058         //Clear the base classes and then clear/delete any local
00059         //members. Its necessary for this Clear method to exist
00060         //in the case that instances of this object are stored
00061         //inside of a TClonesArray
00062         KSystemRecord::Clear(opt);
00063         
00064         //Clear and delete local objects here. 
00065         
00066         //Re initialize local members here and prepare for the next use of this class.
00067   InitializeMembers();
00068 }

00093 Bool_t KBoloSystemRecord::IsSame(const KBoloSystemRecord &aRec, Bool_t bPrint) const
00094 {
00095         Bool_t bIsEqual = true; //assume its true, then test for differences
00096         
00097         //call the base class's IsSame methods
00098         if(!this->KSystemRecord::IsSame(aRec,bPrint)){
00099                 bIsEqual = false;
00100                 if(!bPrint)
00101                         return false;  //if we're not printing out, just return false at first failure
00102                 //the operator== method uses this functionality.
00103         }
00104         
00105         if(fRunName != aRec.fRunName){
00106                 bIsEqual = false;
00107                 if (bPrint) 
00108                         cout << "KBoloSystemRecord fDistanceEst Not Equal. lhs: " 
00109                         << fRunName << " != rhs " << aRec.fRunName << endl;     
00110                 else
00111                         return false;  
00112         }
00113 
00114         
00115         return bIsEqual;
00116         
00117 }

00119 void KBoloSystemRecord::Compact(void)
00120 {
00121         //make the event class as small as possible. this calls 'Compact' for all member
00122         //variables that are KDS classes, member variables that can be compacted (such as TBits)
00123         //and base classes

00125         KSystemRecord::Compact();
00126         
00127 }
